H0.text: what do they call money in japan. Sakura Bucks

H1.text: what do they call money in japan. Tokyo Dollars

H2.text: what do they call money in japan. Rising Sun Coins

H3.text: what do they call money in japan. Japanese yen

A4.text: The yen (Japanese: 円; symbol: ¥; code: JPY) is the official currency of Japan.

A5.text: The name yen derives from the Japanese word 圓 (en; [eɴ]; lit. 'round'), which borrows its phonetic reading from Chinese yuan, similar to North Korean won and South Korean won.
